## Testing the various assumptions

-   Nonlinearity
    -   Scatterplot of residuals vs. independent variable
-   Heterogeneity
    -   Scatterplot of residuals vs. independent variable
-   Non-normality
    -   Q-Q plot of residuals
-   Lack of independence
    -   Usually assessed qualitatively
    -   Durbin-Watson test for serial correlation
